oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dug relics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This collection of dug relics was recovered from Lincoln County (Tenn." Included are three unfired Spencer cartridges, a brass infantry insignia, an oval iron buckle, a bullet mould with a wrench handle, a brass saddle bag stud, part of a screw barrel pistol, civlian bridle rosettes, a Federal spur, a US padlock, shoe taps, bayonet scabbard tips, a .69 caliber minnie ball, a small, eagle device, and a small US shield device. The later two items were most likely used on a pre-war shako.
